room_title: Escape room "The Hall of Zombie" by House of Clues in Houston
review: We did our annual work Christmas party here. They broke us up into 3 different rooms. We did Egypt, mystery and the zombie room. I did the zombie room, and let me tell you... it was intense! The zombie was awesome and totally scary. We all completed our rooms and ate dinner in the party room. Our hostess was very friendly and helpful. Overall it was a fun and positive experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Hall of Zombie" by House of Clues in Houston
review: Awesome time! Zombie room was fun, beat it with time to spare. Will be going back very soon.

room_title: Escape room "The Hall of Zombie" by House of Clues in Houston
review: Took my daughter here for her sweet 16 party. This place is awesome! We had so much fun in the zombie room. ..it was very challenging and exciting! Made it out with 10 minutes to spare!

room_title: Escape room "The Hall of Zombie" by House of Clues in Houston
review: Awesome! So much fun! I highly recommend this place!! Conroe needed something different and fun to do! Thanks Lisa and family!!

room_title: Escape room "The Hall of Zombie" by House of Clues in Houston
review: Even tho we failed. We had a blast in the zombie room. The zombie never lost character no matter how hard we tried to make him laugh. Great place and friendly owner. Can't wait to try out some of the other rooms!
